item.title: justCTF[*] 2020 - A Collection of Web Problems
item.description: This last weekend was justCTF 2020 (delayed last year so it was held this year :P), held by justCatTheFish. Although I was focused between this and some other work, I was able to look through a few of the web challenges and will document them here. Forgotten Name I found this on a total fluke. I wasn’t paying attention to the challenge much but the description was compelling: I’m hesitant to attempt to nmap all known domains of justCatTheFish’s network, and so instead thought about the nature of their subdomains.
